name: 4-telestration
description: What happens when text-to-image and image-to-text AI models get into an endless loop

scripts.gen_dev_cert: mkdir tmp && openssl req -x509 -newkey rsa:4096 -keyout tmp/your.key -out tmp/your.cert -days 9999 -nodes -subj /CN=127.0.0.1

author: Jerome Lecomte <jerle76@gmail.com>
